name: CrowdPlat, Inc.
description: Developer of a crowdsourcing platform designed for staffing and outsourcing needs. The company provides managed freelance teams for enterprise projects and takes complete accountability for delivery by assigning an in-house project manager to select the freelance team and run the project from start to finish, enabling businesses to get their projects completed efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of a crowdsourcing platform designed for staffing and outsourcing needs. The company provides managed freelance teams for enterprise projects and takes complete accountability for delivery by assigning an in-house project manager to select the freelance team and run the project from start to finish, enabling businesses to get their projects completed efficiently.
